verses.verse: "Now it shall be, if<WH518> you will diligently<WH8085> obey<WH8085> <WH6963> the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> being<WH8104> careful<WH8104> to do<WH6213> all<WH3605> His commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you today,<WH3117> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will set<WH5414> you high<WH5945> above<WH5921> all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> of the earth.<WH776>
"And all<WH3605> these<WH428> blessings<WH1293> shall come<WH935> upon you and overtake<WH5381> you, if<WH3588> you will obey<WH8085> <WH6963> the Lord<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
"Blessed<WH1288> [shall] you [be] in the city,<WH5892> and blessed<WH1288> [shall] you [be] in the country.<WH7704>

"Blessed<WH1288> [shall be] the offspring<WH6529> of your body<WH990> and the produce<WH6529> of your ground<WH127> and the offspring<WH6529> of your beasts,<WH929> the increase<WH7698> of your herd<WH504> and the young<WH6251> of your flock.<WH6629>
"Blessed<WH1288> [shall be] your basket<WH2935> and your kneading<WH4863> bowl.<WH4863>
"Blessed<WH1288> [shall] you [be] when you come<WH935> in, and blessed<WH1288> [shall] you [be] when you go<WH3318> out.

"The Lord<WH3068> will cause<WH5414> your enemies<WH340> who rise<WH6965> up against<WH5921> you to be defeated<WH5062> before<WH6440> you; they shall come<WH3318> out against<WH413> you one<WH259> way<WH1870> and shall flee<WH5127> before<WH6440> you seven<WH7651> ways.<WH1870>

"The Lord<WH3068> will command<WH6680> the blessing<WH1293> upon you in your barns<WH618> and in all<WH3605> that you put<WH9303> your hand<WH3027> to, and He will bless<WH1288> you in the land<WH776> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you.

"The Lord<WH3068> will establish<WH6965> you as a holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> to Himself, as He swore<WH7650> to you, if<WH3588> you will keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and walk<WH1980> in His ways.<WH1870>
"So all<WH3605> the peoples<WH5971> of the earth<WH776> shall see<WH7200> that you are called<WH7121> by the name<WH8034> of the Lord;<WH3068> and they shall be afraid<WH3372> of you.

"And the Lord<WH3068> will make you abound<WH3498> in prosperity,<WH9186> in the offspring<WH6529> of your body<WH990> and in the offspring<WH6529> of your beast<WH929> and in the produce<WH6529> of your ground,<WH127> in the land<WH127> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to your fathers to give<WH1> you.

"The Lord<WH3068> will open<WH6605> for you His good<WH2896> storehouse,<WH214> the heavens,<WH8064> to give<WH5414> rain<WH4306> to your land<WH776> in its season<WH6256> and to bless<WH1288> all<WH3605> the work<WH4639> of your hand;<WH3027> and you shall lend<WH9233> to many<WH7227> nations,<WH1471> but you shall not borrow.<WH9233>

"And the Lord<WH3068> shall make<WH5414> you the head<WH7218> and not the tail,<WH2180> and you only<WH7534> shall be above,<WH4605> and you shall not be underneath,<WH4295> if<WH3588> you will listen<WH8085> to the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> which<WH834> I charge<WH6680> you today,<WH3117> to observe<WH6213> [them] carefully,<WH6213>

and do not turn<WH5493> aside<WH5493> from any<WH3605> of the words<WH1697> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you today,<WH3117> to the right<WH3225> or to the left,<WH8040> to go<WH1980> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to serve<WH5647> them.

"But it shall come<WH1961> about, if<WH518> you will not obey<WH8085> <WH6963> the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to observe<WH6213> to do<WH6213> all<WH3605> His commandments<WH4687> and His statutes<WH2708> with which<WH834> I charge<WH6680> you today,<WH3117> that all<WH3605> these<WH428> curses<WH7045> shall come<WH935> upon you and overtake<WH5381> you.
"Cursed<WH779> [shall] you [be] in the city,<WH5892> and cursed<WH779> [shall] you [be] in the country.<WH7704>
"Cursed<WH779> [shall be] your basket<WH2935> and your kneading<WH4863> bowl.<WH4863>

"Cursed<WH779> [shall be] the offspring<WH6529> of your body<WH990> and the produce<WH6529> of your ground,<WH127> the increase<WH7698> of your herd<WH504> and the young<WH6251> of your flock.<WH6629>
"Cursed<WH779> [shall] you [be] when you come<WH935> in, and cursed<WH779> [shall] you [be] when you go<WH3318> out.

"The Lord<WH3068> will send<WH7971> upon you curses,<WH3994> confusion,<WH4103> and rebuke,<WH4045> in all<WH3605> you undertake<WH3027> <WH9303> to do,<WH6213> until<WH5704> you are destroyed<WH8045> and until<WH5704> you perish quickly,<WH6> on account<WH4118> <WH4480> of the evil<WH6440> of your deeds,<WH7455> because<WH4611> you have forsaken<WH834> Me.

"The Lord<WH3068> will make the pestilence<WH1698> cling<WH1692> to you until<WH5704> He has consumed<WH3615> you from the land,<WH127> where<WH834> <WH8033> you are entering<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.

"The Lord<WH3068> will smite<WH5221> you with consumption<WH7829> and with fever<WH6920> and with inflammation<WH1816> and with fiery<WH2746> heat<WH2746> and with the sword<WH2719> and with blight<WH9584> and with mildew,<WH3420> and they shall pursue<WH7291> you until<WH5704> you perish.
"And the heaven<WH8064> which<WH834> is over<WH5921> your head<WH7218> shall be bronze,<WH5178> and the earth<WH776> which<WH834> is under<WH8478> you, iron.<WH1270>

"The Lord<WH3068> will make<WH5414> the rain<WH4306> of your land<WH776> powder<WH80> and dust;<WH6083> from heaven<WH8064> it shall come<WH3381> down<WH3381> on you until<WH5704> you are destroyed.<WH8045>

"The Lord<WH3068> will cause<WH5414> you to be defeated<WH5062> before<WH6440> your enemies;<WH340> you shall go<WH3318> out one<WH259> way<WH1870> against<WH413> them, but you shall flee<WH5127> seven<WH7651> ways<WH1870> before<WH6440> them, and you shall be [an example of] terror<WH2113> to all<WH3605> the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth.<WH776>

"And your carcasses<WH5038> shall be food<WH3978> to all<WH3605> birds<WH5775> of the sky<WH8064> and to the beasts<WH929> of the earth,<WH776> and there<WH369> shall be no<WH369> one<WH369> to frighten<WH2729> [them] away.<WH2729>

"The Lord<WH3068> will smite<WH5221> you with the boils<WH7822> of Egypt<WH4714> and with tumors<WH9425> and with the scab<WH1618> and with the itch,<WH9174> from which<WH834> you cannot<WH3201> <WH3808> be healed.<WH7495>
"The Lord<WH3068> will smite<WH5221> you with madness<WH7697> and with blindness<WH5788> and with bewilderment<WH8541> of heart;<WH3824>

and you shall grope<WH4959> at noon,<WH6672> as the blind<WH5787> man<WH5787> gropes<WH4959> in darkness,<WH653> and you shall not prosper<WH6743> in your ways;<WH1870> but you shall only<WH389> be oppressed<WH6231> and robbed<WH1497> continually,<WH3605> <WH3117> with none<WH369> to save<WH3467> you.

"You shall betroth<WH781> a wife,<WH802> but another<WH312> man<WH376> shall violate<WH7693> her; you shall build<WH1129> a house,<WH1004> but you shall not live<WH3427> in it; you shall plant<WH5193> a vineyard,<WH3754> but you shall not use<WH2490> its fruit.<WH2490>

"Your ox<WH7794> shall be slaughtered<WH2873> before your eyes,<WH5869> but you shall not eat<WH398> of it; your donkey<WH2543> shall be torn<WH1497> away<WH1497> from you, and shall not be restored<WH7725> to you; your sheep<WH6629> shall be given<WH5414> to your enemies,<WH340> and you shall have<WH369> none<WH369> to save<WH3467> you.

"Your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> shall be given<WH5414> to another<WH312> people,<WH5971> while your eyes<WH5869> shall look<WH7200> on and yearn<WH3616> for them continually<WH3605>;<WH3117> but there<WH369> shall be nothing<WH369> you can do.<WH3027>

"A people<WH5971> whom<WH834> you do not know<WH3045> shall eat<WH398> up the produce<WH6529> of your ground<WH127> and all<WH3605> your labors,<WH3018> and you shall never<WH7534> be anything<WH7534> but oppressed<WH6231> and crushed<WH7533> continually.<WH3605> <WH3117>
"And you shall be driven<WH7696> mad<WH7696> by the sight<WH4758> of what<WH834> you see.<WH7200>

"The Lord<WH3068> will strike<WH5221> you on the knees<WH1290> and legs<WH7785> with sore<WH7451> boils,<WH7822> from which<WH834> you cannot<WH3201> <WH3808> be healed,<WH7495> from the sole<WH3709> of your foot<WH7272> to the crown<WH6936> of your head.<WH6936>

"The Lord<WH3068> will bring<WH1980> you and your king,<WH4428> whom<WH834> you shall set<WH6965> over<WH5921> you, to a nation<WH1471> which<WH834> neither<WH3808> you nor<WH3808> your fathers have known,<WH1> and there<WH3045> you shall serve<WH8033> other<WH5647> gods,<WH312> wood<WH430> and stone.<WH6086>
"And you shall become<WH1961> a horror,<WH8047> a proverb,<WH4912> and a taunt<WH8148> among all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> where<WH834> <WH8033> the Lord<WH3068> will drive<WH5090> you.
"You shall bring<WH3318> out much<WH7227> seed<WH2233> to the field<WH7704> but you shall gather<WH622> in little,<WH4592> for the locust<WH697> shall consume<WH2628> it.

"You shall plant<WH5193> and cultivate<WH5647> vineyards,<WH3754> but you shall neither<WH3808> drink<WH8354> of the wine<WH3196> nor<WH3808> gather<WH103> [the grapes,] for the worm<WH9641> shall devour<WH398> them.

"You shall have<WH1961> olive<WH2132> trees<WH2132> throughout<WH3605> your territory<WH1366> but you shall not anoint<WH5480> yourself with the oil,<WH8081> for your olives<WH2132> shall drop<WH5394> off.<WH5394>
"You shall have<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323> but they shall not be yours, for they shall go<WH1980> into captivity.<WH7628>
"The cricket<WH9488> shall possess<WH3423> all<WH3605> your trees<WH6086> and the produce<WH6529> of your ground.<WH127>
"The alien<WH1616> who<WH834> is among<WH7130> you shall rise<WH5927> above<WH5921> you higher<WH4605> and higher,<WH4605> but you shall go<WH3381> down<WH3381> lower<WH4295> and lower.<WH4295>
"He shall lend<WH9233> to you, but you shall not lend<WH9233> to him; he shall be the head,<WH7218> and you shall be the tail.<WH2180>

"So all<WH3605> these<WH428> curses<WH7045> shall come<WH935> on you and pursue<WH7291> you and overtake<WH5381> you until<WH5704> you are destroyed,<WH8045> because<WH3588> you would not obey<WH8085> <WH6963> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> by keeping<WH8104> His commandments<WH4687> and His statutes<WH2708> which<WH834> He commanded<WH6680> you.
"And they shall become<WH1961> a sign<WH226> and a wonder<WH4159> on you and your descendants<WH2233> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>
"Because<WH8478> <WH834> you did not serve<WH5647> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> with joy<WH8057> and a glad<WH2898> heart,<WH3824> for the abundance<WH7230> of all<WH3605> things;<WH3605>

therefore you shall serve<WH5647> your enemies<WH340> whom<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> shall send<WH7971> against you, in hunger,<WH7458> in thirst,<WH6772> in nakedness,<WH5903> and in the lack<WH2640> of all<WH3605> things;<WH3605> and He will put<WH5414> an iron<WH1270> yoke<WH5923> on your neck<WH6677> until<WH5704> He has destroyed<WH8045> you.

"The Lord<WH3068> will bring<WH5375> a nation<WH1471> against<WH5921> you from afar,<WH7350> from the end<WH7097> of the earth,<WH776> as the eagle<WH5404> swoops<WH1675> down,<WH1675> a nation<WH1471> whose<WH834> language<WH3956> you shall not understand,<WH8085>
a nation<WH1471> of fierce<WH5794> countenance<WH6440> who<WH834> shall have<WH5375> no<WH3808> respect<WH6440> for the old,<WH2205> nor<WH3808> show<WH2603> favor<WH2603> to the young.<WH5288>

"Moreover, it shall eat<WH398> the offspring<WH6529> of your herd<WH929> and the produce<WH6529> of your ground<WH127> until<WH5704> you are destroyed,<WH8045> who<WH834> also leaves<WH7604> you no<WH3808> grain,<WH1715> new<WH8492> wine,<WH8492> or oil,<WH3323> nor<WH3808> the increase<WH7698> of your herd<WH504> or the young<WH6251> of your flock<WH6629> until<WH5704> they have caused you to perish.

"And it shall besiege<WH9503> you in all<WH3605> your towns<WH8179> until<WH5704> your high<WH1364> and fortified<WH1219> walls<WH2346> in which<WH834> you trusted<WH982> come<WH3381> down<WH3381> throughout<WH3605> your land,<WH776> and it shall besiege<WH9503> you in all<WH3605> your towns<WH8179> throughout<WH3605> your land<WH776> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given<WH5414> you.

"Then you shall eat<WH398> the offspring<WH6529> of your own body,<WH990> the flesh<WH1320> of your sons<WH1121> and of your daughters<WH1323> whom<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given<WH5414> you, during the siege<WH4692> and the distress<WH4689> by which<WH834> your enemy<WH340> shall oppress<WH6693> you.

"The man<WH376> who is refined<WH7390> and very<WH3966> delicate<WH6028> among you shall be hostile<WH7489> toward his brother<WH251> and toward the wife<WH802> he cherishes<WH2436> and toward the rest<WH3499> of his children<WH1121> who<WH834> remain,<WH3498>

so<WH4480> that he will not give<WH5414> [even] one<WH259> of them any<WH4480> of the flesh<WH1320> of his children<WH1121> which<WH834> he shall eat,<WH398> since<WH4480> he has nothing<WH1097> <WH3605> [else] left,<WH7604> during the siege<WH4692> and the distress<WH4689> by which<WH834> your enemy<WH340> shall oppress<WH6693> you in all<WH3605> your towns.<WH8179>

"The refined<WH7390> and delicate<WH6028> woman<WH6028> among you, who<WH834> would not venture<WH5254> to set<WH3322> the sole<WH3709> of her foot<WH7272> on the ground<WH776> for delicateness<WH6026> and refinement,<WH7391> shall be hostile<WH7489> toward the husband<WH376> she cherishes<WH2436> and toward her son<WH1121> and daughter,<WH1323>

and toward her afterbirth<WH7988> which issues<WH3318> from between<WH996> her legs<WH7272> and toward her children<WH1121> whom<WH834> she bears;<WH3205> for she shall eat<WH398> them secretly<WH5643> for lack<WH2640> of anything<WH3605> [else,] during the siege<WH4692> and the distress<WH4689> by which<WH834> your enemy<WH340> shall oppress<WH6693> you in your towns.<WH8179>

"If<WH518> you are not careful<WH8104> to observe<WH6213> all<WH3605> the words<WH1697> of this<WH2088> law<WH8451> which are written<WH3789> in this<WH2088> book,<WH5612> to fear<WH3372> this<WH2088> honored<WH3513> and awesome<WH3372> name,<WH8034> the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430>

then the Lord<WH3068> will bring<WH6381> extraordinary<WH6381> plagues<WH4347> on you and your descendants,<WH2233> even severe<WH1419> and lasting<WH539> plagues,<WH4347> and miserable<WH7451> and chronic<WH539> sicknesses.<WH2483>
"And He will bring<WH7725> back<WH7725> on you all<WH3605> the diseases<WH4064> of Egypt<WH4714> of which<WH834> you were afraid,<WH3025> and they shall cling<WH1692> to you.

"Also<WH1571> every<WH3605> sickness<WH2483> and every<WH3605> plague<WH4347> which,<WH834> not written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of this<WH2088> law,<WH8451> the Lord<WH3068> will bring<WH5927> on you until<WH5704> you are destroyed.<WH8045>

"Then you shall be left<WH7604> few<WH4592> in number,<WH4962> whereas<WH8478> <WH834> you were as the stars<WH3556> of heaven<WH8064> for multitude,<WH7230> because<WH3588> you did not obey<WH8085> <WH6963> the Lord<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

"And it shall come<WH1961> about that as the Lord<WH3068> delighted<WH7797> over<WH5921> you to prosper<WH3190> you, and multiply<WH7235> you, so<WH3651> the Lord<WH3068> will delight<WH7797> over<WH5921> you to make you perish and destroy<WH6> you; and you shall be torn<WH8045> from the land<WH5255> where<WH127> <WH834> you are entering<WH8033> to possess<WH935> it.

"Moreover, the Lord<WH3068> will scatter<WH6327> you among all<WH3605> peoples,<WH5971> from one end<WH7097> of the earth<WH776> to the other end<WH7097> of the earth;<WH776> and there<WH8033> you shall serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> wood<WH6086> and stone,<WH68> which<WH834> you or your fathers have not known.<WH1>

"And among those<WH1992> nations<WH1471> you shall find<WH7280> no<WH3808> rest,<WH7280> and there shall be no<WH3808> resting<WH4496> place<WH4494> for the sole<WH3709> of your foot;<WH7272> but there<WH8033> the Lord<WH3068> will give<WH5414> you a trembling<WH7268> heart,<WH3820> failing<WH3631> of eyes,<WH5869> and despair<WH1671> of soul.<WH5315>
"So your life<WH9132> shall hang<WH8511> in doubt before you; and you shall be in dread<WH6342> night<WH3915> and day,<WH3119> and shall have<WH539> no<WH3808> assurance<WH539> of your life.<WH9132>

"In the morning<WH1242> you shall say,<WH559> 'Would<WH4310> <WH5414> that it were evening!<WH6153>' And at evening<WH6153> you shall say,<WH559> 'Would<WH4310> <WH5414> that it were morning!<WH1242>' because<WH4480> of the dread<WH6343> of your heart<WH3824> which<WH834> you dread,<WH6342> and for the sight<WH4758> of your eyes<WH5869> which<WH834> you shall see.<WH7200>

"And the Lord<WH3068> will bring<WH7725> you back<WH7725> to Egypt<WH4714> in ships,<WH591> by the way<WH1870> about which<WH834> I spoke<WH559> to you, 'You will never<WH3808> see<WH7200> it again!<WH3254>' And there<WH8033> you shall offer<WH4376> yourselves for sale<WH4376> to your enemies<WH340> as male<WH5650> and female<WH8198> slaves,<WH8198> <WH5650> but there<WH369> will be no<WH369> buyer.<WH7069>"
